definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: Then, the low dose effects and roentgenography interval were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並討論了低劑量效應與造影的間隔時間。

sentences.english: The genic express of the subunit in F1 generation had dose effects.
sentences.chinese: 亞基在F1代的基因表達存在劑量效應。

sentences.english: Results showed the obvious dose-response relationship between the DNA damage(DNA damage rate and length of DNA migrations) and doses of mercuric chloride and cadmium chloride .
sentences.chinese: DNA損傷率和遷移距離存在明顯的劑量效應關係。

sentences.english: Objective To study the dose-response of internal radiation therapy in aged patients with osseous metastases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討老年癌症骨轉移患者內照射治療的劑量效應。

sentences.english: The gene dose effect in endosperms is observed.
sentences.chinese: 胚乳酯酶還表現明顯的基因劑量效應。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the fitting about S model dose-effect curve with the accumulation normal distribution function.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究S型劑量效應曲線的累積正態分佈函數擬合。

sentences.english: Such changes may be due to the effect of gene dosage.
sentences.chinese: 可能是基因的劑量效應造成了成帶強度的不同。
